long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension automates the process of entering work hours into BambooHR timesheets, saving you from manually inputting hours day by day. 
Simply set your weekly schedule, and with one click, the extension fills in your hours for the entire pay period. You can even skip setting your schedule. The default values will be used from 09 AM to 06 PM, with a one-hour break.
You can also quickly add or delete time entries for specific days. 
It's designed to save you time, so you can focus on more important things, like spending time with family and friends.
The extension is completely safe—it doesn't collect or send any personal data. It just helps you avoid the hassle of manual time entry!
